attributes.action: Provide Ukrainian refugees with settled status to enable a stable life in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Ukraine schemes are limited to 3 years and thousands of visas are set to expire in 2025. The schemes’ duration depends on the end of the war which is unknown. This uncertainty creates lots of pressure for already stressed refugees and makes long-term planning and commitments impossible, which can significantly reduce the quality of life. Alternative visa routes to settle could be costly and not fit for all Ukrainians, putting them at risk of eventually having to leave the UK or stay in the UK illegally.
attributes.background: Provide Ukrainians on Ukraine visa schemes with settled status. This will help to bring stability to their lives, which is threatened by the time limit of the schemes and uncertainty of when the war is going to end.
